title: (x) Fortel's pizza signage - Franklin Gothic {Jan E, Antonio Cavedoni, Eric Quenenville}
content:
Local pizza parlor... can you help? i don’t know the font

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203181602im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/fortels_3584.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Magazine text faces - ITC Berkeley, Adobe Caslon, Eldorado {Marc O}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203181602/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38566 "Go to previous forum topic") [Stateless Bloodstream, Prism #1, Stateless, Exit ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203181602/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38600 "Go to next forum topic")
author: clynne87

comments.content: It looks like [Frankin Gothic Demi Compressed](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203181602/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-franklin-gothic/demi-compressed/). I linked to the ITC version, but there other [many others](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203181602/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=Franklin+Gothic) apparently.

I know this one....

Franklin Gothik extra condensend
